body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Nail Salon Solutions. My name is Wayne Cook. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Wayne, my name is Anna Bailey.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Anna. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is annabailey@example.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Anna. Do you have any specific questions or concerns regarding our services at Nail Salon Solutions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I wanted to inquire about the different nail polish brands you carry and your pricing for nail art services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We offer a variety of premium nail polish brands including Essie and OPI. For nail art services, we have packages starting from thirty dollars. Is there anything else you would like to know, Anna?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that covers my questions for now. Thank you for your assistance, Wayne.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Anna. If you have any further questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
